member.name: P:VirtoCommerce.OrdersModule.Core.Model.CustomerOrder.DiscountAmount
member.summary: When a discount is applied to the order, the tax calculation has already been applied, and is reflected in the tax. Therefore, a discount applying to the order will occur after tax. For instance, if the cart subtotal is $100, and $15 is the tax subtotal, a cart-wide discount of 10% will yield a total of $105 ($100 subtotal â€“ $10 discount + $15 tax on the original $100).
